vernac_cmds: Definition lin_dep (X : part_set V) := exists n : Nat, (exists a : seq (S n) F, (exists v : seq (S n) X, distinct v /\ ~ a =' const_seq (S n) (zero F) in _ /\ sum (mult_by_scalars a (Map_embed v)) =' (zero V) in _)).
Definition lin_indep (X : part_set V) := ~ lin_dep X.

Definition lin_indep' (X : part_set V) := forall (n : Nat) (a : seq (S n) F) (v : seq (S n) X), distinct v -> ~ a =' const_seq (S n) (zero F) in _ -> ~ sum (mult_by_scalars a (Map_embed v)) =' (zero V) in _.
Lemma lin_dep_comp : forall X Y : part_set V, X =' Y in _ -> lin_dep X -> lin_dep Y.
apply (H0 i j); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (x1 i)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (Map_to_equal_subsets H x1 i)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (x1 j)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (Map_to_equal_subsets H x1 j)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed x1))); auto with algebra.
Lemma lin_indep_comp : forall X Y : part_set V, X =' Y in _ -> lin_indep X -> lin_indep Y.
apply lin_dep_comp with Y; auto with algebra.
Lemma lin_dep_defs_eqv : forall X : part_set V, lin_indep X <-> lin_indep' X.
Lemma zero_imp_lin_dep : forall (F : field) (V : vectorspace F) (X : part_set V), in_part (zero V) X -> lin_dep X.
apply Trans with ((zero V) +' (zero V)); auto with algebra.
Lemma empty_lin_indep : forall (F : field) (V : vectorspace F), lin_indep (empty V).
Lemma lin_dep_include : forall S1 S2 : part_set V, included S1 S2 -> lin_dep S1 -> lin_dep S2.
apply (H0 i j); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed x1))); auto with algebra.
Lemma lin_indep_include : forall S1 S2 : part_set V, included S1 S2 -> lin_indep S2 -> lin_indep S1.
Lemma lin_indep_prop : forall (n : Nat) (a : seq n F) (v : seq n V), distinct v -> lin_indep (seq_set v) -> sum (mult_by_scalars a v) =' (zero V) in _ -> a =' const_seq n (zero F) in _.
generalize (H2 H0); clear H3 H2 H0.
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars a v)); auto with algebra.
Lemma lin_indep_doesn't_contain_zero : forall X : part_set V, lin_indep X -> ~ in_part (zero V) X.
intros; red in |- *; red in H; intro.
red in H; (apply H; auto with algebra).
Lemma inject_subsets_lin_dep : forall (W : subspace V) (X : part_set W), lin_dep X <-> lin_dep (inject_subsets X).
inversion_clear H; inversion_clear H0; inversion_clear H; inversion_clear H0; inversion_clear H1.
red in H; (apply (H _ _ H1); auto with algebra).
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (zero W)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (sum (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed x1)))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (sum (Map_embed (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed x1)))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (head (Map_embed c) +' sum (Seqtl (Map_embed c))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (head c +' sum (Seqtl c))).
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (head c) +' subtype_elt (sum (Seqtl c))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (head (Map_embed c) +' sum (Map_embed (Seqtl c))); auto with algebra.
inversion_clear H; inversion_clear H0; inversion_clear H; inversion_clear H0; inversion_clear H1.
apply Trans with (zero V); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (sum (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed (comp_map_map (Build_Map (uninject_subsetsify_comp (A:=V) (B:=W) (C:=X)) :Map _ _) x1) :Map _ W)))).
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed x1))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (sum (Map_embed (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed (comp_map_map (Build_Map (uninject_subsetsify_comp (A:=V) (B:=W) (C:=X)) :Map _ _) x1) :Map _ W)))).
apply Trans with (head (Map_embed c) +' sum (Seqtl (Map_embed c))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (head c +' sum (Seqtl c))).
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (head c) +' subtype_elt (sum (Seqtl c))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (head (Map_embed c) +' sum (Map_embed (Seqtl c))); auto with algebra.
simpl in |- *; red in |- *; simpl in |- *.
Definition max_lin_indep (F : field) (V : vectorspace F) (X Y : part_set V) := included X Y /\ lin_indep X /\ (forall y : V, in_part y Y -> ~ in_part y X -> lin_dep (union X (single y))).

command: apply (H0 i j); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (x1 i)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (Map_to_equal_subsets H x1 i)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (x1 j)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (subtype_elt (Map_to_equal_subsets H x1 j)); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed x1))); auto with algebra.
apply lin_dep_comp with Y; auto with algebra.
apply Trans with ((zero V) +' (zero V)); auto with algebra.
apply (H0 i j); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars x0 (Map_embed x1))); auto with algebra.
generalize (H2 H0); clear H3 H2 H0.
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars a v)); auto with algebra.
intros; red in |- *; red in H; intro.
red in H; (apply H; auto with algebra).
